snippet: The International Atomic Energy Agency’s team is to inspect a heavy-water production plant on Sunday, after access was denied for years.
abstract: Team of nuclear experts representing International Atomic Energy Agency arrive in Iran and will inspect Arak heavy-water production plant after years of being denied access.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The International Atomic Energy Agency’s team is to inspect a heavy-water production plant on Sunday, after access was denied for years.

headline.main: U.N.’s Nuclear Inspectors Arrive in Iran
headline.print_headline: U.N.’s Nuclear Inspectors Arrive in Iran
